column4: hey all. so when i run firefox from an SSH console (to run it on the server machine, NOT mine (the client)) i use the --display :0 command... but if firefox is already running instead of opening the web page in a tab, it gives an error on the server that firefox is already running and the need to close the current firefox...
i can run firefox remotely fine if it's not already running... but if it is running i get that error.
